mapper.insert: insert into portfolio set businessId = #{businessId}, price = #{price}, takingTime = #{takingTime}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}
mapper.select: SELECT f.businessId, f.portfolioId, f.title, t.pic AS isThumbnail FROM portfolio f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.portfolioId, c.pic FROM portfolio_pic c WHERE c.state = 2 ) t ON f.portfolioId = t.portfolioId LEFT JOIN business b ON b.businessId = f.businessId LEFT JOIN detail_type d ON d.detailTypeId = b.detailTypeId LEFT JOIN category k ON k.categoryId = d.categoryId WHERE (#{categoryId} IS null OR k.categoryId = #{categoryId}) AND (#{detailTypeId} IS null OR d.detailTypeId = #{detailTypeId}) AND (#{businessId} IS null OR b.businessId = #{businessId});

SELECT p.businessId, p.portfolioId, p.title, p.price, p.takingTime, p.contents ,d.detailTypeName as detailType, c.categoryName as category FROM portfolio p JOIN business b ON p.businessId = b.businessId join detail_type d ON d.detailTypeId = b.businessId join category c on c.categoryId = d.categoryId WHERE p.portfolioId = #{portfolioId}
select f.businessId, p.portfolioId, p.portfolioPicId, p.pic from portfolio_pic p join portfolio f on p.portfolioId = f.portfolioId where p.portfolioId = #{portfolioId}
